intro: Peristeria aspersa, commonly known as the velvet tunic or velvet plant, is a flowering plant native to Mexico and Central America. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its dark, velvety leaves and clusters of fragrant, white or pale yellow flowers. It is a perennial herb that thrives in warm, humid environments. Peristeria aspersa is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and pleasant fragrance.
